scripts.docs:serve: docker run --rm -it -p 8000:8000 --entrypoint=/bin/sh -v "%cd%":/docs squidfunk/mkdocs-material -c "pip install mkdocs-swagger-ui-tag && mkdocs serve --dev-addr 0.0.0.0:8000"
scripts.api:generate:dart: docker run --rm  -v %cd%:/local --entrypoint=/bin/sh -w /local openapitools/openapi-generator-cli -c "openapi-generator-cli generate -i /local/docs/assets/openapi-spec.json -g dart -o /local/frontend/api --global-property apiDocs=false,modelDocs=false,apiTests=false,modelTests=false && rm -rf /local/frontend/lib/api && mkdir -p /local/frontend/lib/api && mv /local/frontend/api/lib/* /local/frontend/lib/api/ && rm -rf /local/frontend/api "
